videos.description: Kemba Walker shows off the range on 3

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kemba Walker shows off the range on 3) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kemba Walker shows off the range on 3

videos.description: LaMelo Ball feeds Terry Rozier on the wing for a 3-pointer to tie the game.
videos.headline: LaMelo feeds Rozier for 3

videos.description: Alec Burks feeds Obi Toppin on the break who takes off for the one-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Toppin throws down on the break ) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Toppin throws down on the break

videos.description: Miles Bridges throws down the ferocious stuff.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Miles Bridges gets up for the beautiful jam) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges electrifies with windmill slam

videos.description: Miles Bridges sinks a wild and-1 in mid-air and celebrates with push-ups.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges does push-ups after acrobatic and-1) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges does push-ups after acrobatic and-1

videos.description: Obi Toppin throws down a windmill dunk and on the next possession Miles Bridges does the exact same.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Whose windmill dunk was better, Toppin or Bridges?) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Whose windmill dunk was better, Toppin or Bridges?
